channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- KKProgressbar2 Free
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- KKProgressbar2 Free

item.title: CVE-2024-4533|2024-05-27T06:00:02.573Z -- Unknown -- KKProgressbar2 Free
item.description: The KKProgressbar2 Free WordPress plugin through 1.1.4.2 does not sanitize and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, allowing admin users to perform SQL injection attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-4535|2024-05-27T06:00:02.939Z -- Unknown -- KKProgressbar2 Free
item.description: The KKProgressbar2 Free WordPress plugin through 1.1.4.2 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-4534|2024-05-27T06:00:02.758Z -- Unknown -- KKProgressbar2 Free
item.description: The KKProgressbar2 Free WordPress plugin through 1.1.4.2 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack
